Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional quality and value, I am confident it will bring significant benefits to you. Considering its worth, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $14500. This special offer is designed to ensure you have the opportunity to acquire this remarkable product without compromising on its value. I trust you will find this proposal attractive and look forward to your positive response. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. Thank you for considering our offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $14,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $14,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
